name: Ascension (itch) (zalmoxis-games)
description:
Ascension is the ultimate 2D RPG.

- Become who you want to be, play the way you want
- Ascend to Godhood, and beyond
- Huge, massive, content-filled worlds
- Co-op & multiplayer available
- Complex gameplay, complex politics
- Hyper realistic physics and endless customization
